content: * you can find the free pattern here - https //cozynooksdesigns com/freecrochetchristmasstockings 1 * you can find the lion brand yarn kit here 2 the joyful stockings are a christmas crochet pattern that is a perfect addition to your color christmas decor featuring a granny square cuff and granny stripes these crochet stockings will be a timeless piece of christmas decor for years to come considered intermediate level there is a full video tutorial included as well as explanation pictures you can find the full video tutorial here 3 pattern includes - instant download pdf file us crochet terminology tech-edited pattern gauge 2 videos 28 explanation pictures level - intermediate materials - 4 colors of worsted weight yarn - basic stitch yarn 155 145 145 and 155 yards us h/5 0 mm crochet hook stitch markers scissors tapestry needle finished sized for stocking excluding handles - 21 x 9 you can purchase the lion brand yarn kit pattern and yarn colors of you choice here - https //lionbrand sjv io/gkk6gb this pattern has been professionally tech-edited *** if you buy 2 patterns - use code 2patterns for 10% off if you buy 3 patterns - use code 3patterns for 15% off if you buy 4 patterns - use code 4patterns for 20% off *** patterns due to the electronic nature of my patterns i cannot offer refunds 1 https //cozynooksdesigns com/freecrochetchristmasstockings 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/gkk6gb 3 https //www youtube com/cozynooksdesigns sub_confirmation=1
